runs.comm: nice start, hint of shape away as it starts on off stump and defended to the off side
short ball at the body, Charles tries to pull it away and it bobbles into the leg side...he is quite lazy with the running and a direct hit would have been close
beaten! That's a beauty, back of a length and it seams away past the outside edge
first wild heave of the evening, tries to take this from outside off and doesn't make contact
worked off middle stump through midwicket and it's placed well enough for a second
this one comes off the splice as he pulls towards midwicket and it barely clears the fielding circle
starts very full and is firmly driven to cover
well bowled, seams away and beats the outside edge as Smith plays without any footwork
already touching 90mph, at the stumps and tucked through midwicket
flash and a miss outside off. Back of a length and he threw his arms at it
full on off stump, blocked firmly into the off side...good start from Finn
good delivery again, outside off and beats Charles who isn't really getting close to the ball at the moment
drifts onto leg stump and it's flicked away to the vacant long leg for the first boundary. The outfield is very swift
that goes wrong for Bresnan, he tried a bouncer and it flew miles down the leg side. Was a good take by Kieswetter
all the way! He's connected with this one. Was dropped short by Bresnan and Smith stayed on the back foot to launch it over midwicket
responds by going fuller, but Smith responds with a strong square drive that beats the inner ring and races over the net pitches
gets back to off stump, defended firmly towards mid-off
and another! He's cleared the ropes with a brilliant short-arm pull, was a short again from Bresnan and Smith manages to clear Stokes a deep square-leg
slower ball to end the over, dropped square on the off side...22 off the over
full, above 90mph again, driven firmly to the left of mid-off
full outside off and Charles drive straight to cover
well, this is T20...he backs away to leg and gives himself room, Finn tries to follow him but Charles clubs it straight down the ground
driven in the air square through the off side, third man has to run around
that's his best shot, splays his left leg out the way they drives through the line to beat mid-off...top stuff from West Indies
finishes the over with another boundary as he lifts this wide of mid-on...West Indies flying away.
starts full on off stump, defended into the covers
dropped, Dernbach spills one in his follow through as a slower ball comes off the leading edge but the bowler can't take it to his left...wasn't the toughest chance
pushed firmly towards mid-on but the fielder is deep enough to allow a single
back of a length and he can't force it through the off side
another slower ball and it completely beats Charles as he backs away well outside leg
dances around the crease then flicks a straight ball to midwicket...good over from Dernbach
full and straight, pushed to mid-on
stays in his crease, fired in fairly flat and worked out to deep midwicket
flicked along the ground again, it should only have been one by Finn palms the ball away as he dives in the field
this one spins, squares up the batsman and takes the outside which races away down to third man
appeal for lbw, beaten by one that doesn't spin but it's nowhere near
gone! What a ripper, and there's the breakthrough. This turns from middle stump, beats the edge and takes off. Perfect for a left-armer.
huge turn! This rips back from outside off and bounces as well at Charles
gets down to sweep, takes it from outside off and paddles to square leg
comes forward with bat and pad together, pushed into the off side and it's a sharply single
pushed into the off side
drags this from outside off over midwicket, a good dive on the boundary from Stokes keeps them to a couple
uses his feet but can only work it to midwicket
pushed into the off side
touch shorter, played off the back foot out to the cover sweeper
swing and miss! Tries to launch it over midwicket and it turns to beat off stump
steps to leg and opens the face to backward point
backs away outside leg stump again but can only slap it to cover...good over
tucked off the pads into the leg side, that's well placed as he can come back for a second
cut off the back foot and straight to cover
comes forward, takes the inside edge to short fine-leg and there's some confusion over the run but Samuels is easily home
very full and it's heaved wide of long on but they can't make a second
fuller and flatter, flicked down the ground
dragged down a little, he goes back to pull but doesn't really time it out to deep square-leg
lovely bowling, the 'classic' offspinners wicket as it turns back between the gate of Samuels attempt at a booming drive
worked down to long on
full and only dug out as far as midwicket
driven down the ground
goes for a slog-sweep, doesn't really come out of the middle and picks out deep midwicket
huge appeal! Kieswetter goes up for caught behind, but there isn't much support from anyone. Was a lovely ball as it turned sharply
worked through the leg side
looped up by Swann, nudged back to the bowler
this time Hyatt angles the bat on the forward push, and finds a slim gap behind point
driven into the leg side with a strong top hand
swept hard down to long leg, but straight to the fielder on the boundary
Charles clears the front leg and heaves to midwicket
Hyatt shifts his weight forward and then back before pushing down to long off for a single
pitched right up on off stump and it's drilled to long off
ah, a back-of-the-hand slower ball from Bopara. Not quite picked by the batsman, but he puts bat to ball to keep it out
driven into the covers. Bopara is holding them back nicely here
beaten outside off! Charles was back and shaping to cut
another slower one, and it's really well bowled. Charles had committed to a heave to leg but couldn't get anything on it
yet another slow cutter to finish the over, and an angled bat sends the ball to gully
that'll help! First boundary since the powerplay. Hyatt put his left leg down the track and hammered this straight back over Swann's head, the ball landing several metres beyond the boundary
there's an appeal for a stumping as Swann rips one really sharply down the leg side and Kieswetter has the bails off in a flash ... But Hyatt is safely home
Hyatt is forward and outside the line as bat and pad come right together in defence
driven straight to cover off the front foot. Nicely flighted by Swann
flighted again, but this one has disappeared over deep midwicket! Really well played by Hyatt. He got plenty of power into the slog sweep but didn't over hit it
and he follows that up with a nudge into the off side
another boundary, this time off the edge! Swann speared this one down much faster outside off, and the ball took a healthy edge before rolling down to the third man boundary
slashed away behind square, and they're back for the second
Patel keeping things tight here, and Charles can't get this away
he's hit that one! Charles collects the third six in the last ten deliveries with a good thump over long on. He hadn't hit a boundary since the fourth over before this one
gone this time! Charles attempts to repeat the stroke, but this one comes off the toe end and is safely pouched by Finn running in from long on
tossed up from round the stumps, Hyatt flicks off the toes into the leg side
Nkruma Bonner steps to the pitch to defend his first delivery into the off side
he starts with a regulation, seam-up quick delivery that is angled down to third man
short, and fast once again. Bonner is late on the pull, and the ball trickles to the man inside the circle at midwicket

short once more, again Bonner pulls but this time he doesn't bother to keep it down ... the ball is chased down at deep midwicket, and some tandem fielding between Stokes and Bresnan sends it back to the stumps in a flash, but Bonner is safely home at the non-striker's end
ah, there it is. Slower one from Dernbach, and it slips past the outside edge of Hyatt's driving bat
full and fast outside off, the drive is squirted away towards point
Dernbach trundles in much wider of the crease with his final delivery, and arrows one in, the ball snaking in further through the air to beat Bonner on the inside edge this time
yep, he starts with a back-of-the-hand slower one that is chopped down towards gully

Bopara strikes! He zipped this one in much quicker, the ball swung in sharply even as Bonner backed away slightly to the leg side, taking an inside edge and ricocheting off the pad and into the stumps

great catch! Bopara is on a hat-trick thanks to a superb diving catch from Kieswetter. The keeper had gone back for the new batsman. Bopara sent down a quick delivery on a length, catching the edge off a leaden-footed Barnwell
nope, he sends one down full and wide outside off, and Russell is quite happy to raise his arms and leave
this is great bowling from Bopara. A quick yorker zones in on Russell's toes, but the bat comes down just in time to keep it out. There was a speculative appeal from Bopara, but that was bat first
a very slow legcutter jags away outside off, but Hyatt keeps his bat inside the line
perhaps a little unexpected? Dernbach fires down a spitting bouncer and Russell can only fend at it ... the ball drops into space and they scamper a single
is it reversing? Dernbach went wide on the crease once again, but there was definite late movement in to the batsman with this quick delivery
and he follows that up with a slower one, but Hyatt manages to guide it past point for a single
edged, and four! Dernbach pitched it up and Russell through everything into the drive. The ball flew past Kieswetter, who had no chance, and down to third man
beaten outside off by the slower one! He didn't seem to pick that one
fantastic death bowling. A pinpoint inswinging yorker is just about kept out by Russell, who ends up stumbling towards point after jabbing the bat down
completely undone by the slower one. Hyatt shuffles back and forth and lines up a heave to midwicket, but he was through the shot before the ball had even arrived

run out! England strike again. Hyatt cleared the left leg and slapped one down the ground, but Stokes was in from long-on in a flash and as Russell hustled for the second he fired a sharp throw to Bopara at the non-striker's end. The stumps were disturbed in a flash with the batsman short of his ground. Good throw
gone! Well, Bopara is really turning it on with the ball. This was a seam up quicker one, and it swung in sharply to beat Hyatt's swishing blade and disturb the timber
captain Sammy carefully tapes his first ball away into the covers
a slower delivery is squeezed out past point, and tag-team fielding on the boundary keeps them to a hard run two
another slower one, this time Sammy hangs back and chops through cover point for two more
Christian flashes outside off and is beaten
clatter! Dernbach steams in and fires down an unplayable, searing yorker to send Christian on his way. England are surging now, they're well on top
Dernbach welcomes Bishoo with a bouncer, but the ball sails wide of leg stump and is called by the umpire

there goes another one. Wow, England have been utterly flawless in the field this evening. Bishoo tapped one to gully and wandered down the track, but Buttler swooped and threw down the stumps correctly even as the batsman was searching for a single. Bishoo didn't even try to get back, he was stranded
Dernbach aims for the yorker but it slips out as a low full toss outside off, and Edwards gets going with a powerful drive to the wide long off boundary
Edwards is completely flummoxed by the slower one. He didn't come close to hitting it
slapped out into the deep, and Sammy will have the strike in the final over as they scamper back for the second
he starts with a slower one that Sammy is content to just nudge towards midwicket
Sammy sends the ball to deep midwicket with plenty of bottom hand, but it's just a single
a slow legcutter from  Bopara, and well played by the No. 11, who waited for it and angled the ball to gully
gone! Sammy tried to mow a length delivery over midwicket, but got right underneath it and Bairstow was waiting for the chance after running in from the boundary
